name: Verify Admin can promote Writer to Admin
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization via **API**.
- Invite `second user` to project with `Writer` role.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` can promote `Writer` to `Admin`.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization via API.
  • Invite second user to project with Writer role.

Verify that:

  • Admin can promote Writer to Admin.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Verify user role is valid
Message: User role should be Admin!
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/page_steps_impl/proj_people_page_steps.py:37: in verify_ui_user_role
    assert value.lower() == role.lower(), f"User role should be {role}!"
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: User role should be Admin!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_ui/test_project_change_member_roles.py:464: in test_admin_change_writer_to_admin

    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Verify user role is valid
E   Message: User role should be Admin!
